alert.note: Alert for Brown (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:40PM EDT until July 17 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MONROE...SOUTHEASTERN MORGAN AND NORTHWESTERN BROWN COUNTIES... At 840 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Martinsville, or 13 miles northeast of Bloomington, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Mahalasville around 845 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Morgantown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
